ref: 8287 púrīṣa n. ʻ fullness (?) ʼ RV. (cf. purīṣín -- , purīṣyà- ʻ having or giving fullness ʼ RV.), ʻ (rubble as a) filling ʼ TS., ʻ suppletion ʼ ŚāṅkhBr., ʻ ordure ʼ ŚBr. (cf. ending of kárīṣa -- 1). &rcirclemacr Pk. purīsa -- m.n. ʻ dung ʼ; Ku. paraso m. ʻ manure ʼ; H. puras m. ʻ dust, manure ʼ.
